admin/taxjar.title: TaxJar
admin/taxjar.saveSettings.failure: Settings could not be saved, see console for details
admin/taxjar.settings.introduction: If you have a TaxJar account, {tokenLink} to learn how to get an API token.{lineBreak}If you don't have an account and want to sign up, {signupLink}.
admin/taxjar.settings.apiToken.label: TaxJar API token
admin/taxjar.settings.isLive.label: Production mode
admin/taxjar.settings.isLive.helpText: Disable this toggle if using a sandbox API key.
admin/taxjar.settings.enableTaxCalculati: WARNING: Changing this setting may break your checkout. Make sure to test.
admin/taxjar.settings.enableTransactionP: If this toggle is enabled, any invoiced orders where this account acts as the seller will be posted to TaxJar.
admin/taxjar.settings.transactionPosting: Marketplace: All orders.  Fulfillment: Only orders fulfilled on this site.
admin/taxjar.settings.useTaxJarNexus.hel: Enable to use nexus region settings from TaxJar.
admin/taxjar.settings.salesChannelExclud: Sales Channels to Exclude from TaxJar.
Comma separated list of sales channel ids to exclude.
admin/taxjar.settings.exemption.title: Customer Exemptions
admin/taxjar.settings.exemption.email.er: Email is not registered as a VTEX account
